item.title: Identity and Network Security Practitioner Webinar Series
item.description: At Microsoft Security, we believe the best communities are built with the people who use them every day. That’s why we want to hear from you. Webinar series: Microsoft Entra Practitioner Webinar Series (October 2025) This October, we’re hosting a three-part webinar series for Identity and Network Access practitioners. Join us as we journey from high-level strategy to hands-on implementation, unifying identity and network access every step of the way. Each session builds on the last, helping you move from understanding why a unified approach matters to what are the foundations to get started, ...
